name: Rythm.js
body:
Rythm.js ======== Link to the documentation : http://okazari.github.io/Rythm.js/ A javascript library that makes your page dancing. Actually in developpement Getting started =============== Install with npm (Soon) ``` npm install rythm.js ``` Import rythm in to your page ```html ``` Create an audio element with your music as source ```html ``` Add one the rythm css classes to indicate which element will dance. ```html
``` Create a Rythm object and give it the audio element then use the start function ```javascript var rythm = new Rythm(); var audio = document.getElementById('audio'); rythm.setMusic(audio); rythm.start(); ``` Documentation ============= IN PROGESS Rythm object ------------ ```javascript var rythm = new Rythm(); //Default 1 rythm.startingScale = value; //Default 100 rythm.maxValueHistory = value; //Default 0.75 rythm.pulseRatio = value; //Set the music the page will dance to. rythm.setMusic(audioElement); //Adjust the gain of the music. rythm.setGain(value); //Let's dance rythm.start(); //Stop the party rythm.stop(); ``` Classes ------- ``` rythm-bass rythm-medium rythm-high ``` Features ======== TODO Contribute ========== TODO
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
